user_instruction: 'Compose an email to the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee with the latest updates. You can check out my Alumni Tracker on Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Updates from Alumni Tracker for Reunion Email  

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please share the most recent updates from your Alumni Tracker in Notion (new contact details, RSVP statuses, noteworthy news, etc.)? We’d like to incorporate the freshest information into the forthcoming email we’re drafting for the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee.

If there are any specific points you’d like highlighted, just let us know. Thanks so much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee

final_output:

If there are any specific points you’d like highlighted, just let us know. Thanks so much for your help!

[Your Name]
